attributes.action: Stop the police kicking people's doors in without chapping it first
attributes.additional_details: Think the police should have to chap your door before breaking it down to give people the chance of opening it especially over 60 years old and when they don't find anything they should have to pay for the damages they make. Police are going about kicking doors in on the word of the local drug addict and saying they have received information. I am doing this petition to try and give people the chance of opening there door 1st not asking much to give people a chance to open there door before its kicked down.
attributes.background: Police today have far to much power and go about kicking people's doors in without chapping it first on a tip off from your local drug addict or someone who doesn't like you
